item.title: Could anyone convert this..[PI] Whips
item.dc:creator: @Storm_Powner Storm Powner
item.description:
@Storm_Powner wrote:

[quote=“nicke924, post:3, topic:441927”][quote author=Storm Powner link=topic=544590.msg3992183#msg3992183 date=1336748777]
here you go a pi code, figure it out by yourself. not so hard

case 13362: itemDef.modelid = 62714; itemDef.name = "Torva full helm"; itemDef.description = "Torva full helm."; itemDef.modelZoom = 672; itemDef.modelRotationY = 85; itemDef.modelRotationX = 1867; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3; itemDef.anInt165 = 62738; itemDef.anInt200 = 62754; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; break;
[/quote]
Well if you think it’s easy then convert it. I tried but didn’t success. It’s not that color and it’s not visible.[/quote]

if he looks good there are somethings that wrong best method to do it is to have soemthing in itemdef, doesn’t need to be perfect add it compile look errors, and see what is different between that what you added and a correct one and change it.
